Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel in Hoofddorp, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Business Park Schiphol-Rijk and Holland Casino Schiphol Airport. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of World Trade Center Schiphol Airport and Rijksmuseum Amsterdam Schiphol.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 195 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an indoor pool, a steam room, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary at scheduled times.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).

When you stay at Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel in Hoofddorp, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Business Park Schiphol-Rijk and Holland Casino Schiphol Airport. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of World Trade Center Schiphol Airport and Rijksmuseum Amsterdam Schiphol.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Business Park Schiphol-Rijk - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Holland Casino Schiphol Airport - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
World Trade Center Schiphol Airport - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Rijksmuseum Amsterdam Schiphol - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Aalsmeer Flower Auction - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Business Park Amsterdam Osdorp - 8 km / 5 mi
Cobra Museum of Modern Art - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Schouwburg Amstelveen - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
De Meervaart Theater - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Sloterpark and Sloterplas - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Playcenter Silverstone - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
World Fashion Centre - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Olympic Stadium - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi
VU University of Amsterdam - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi
Spaarnwoude - 11 km / 6.8 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel is Amsterdam (AMS-Schiphol) - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Best Western Amsterdam Airport is Amsterdam (AMS-Schiphol) - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi.

RoomType.text: Twin Deluxe Room + Free Wifi + Airport Shuttle
